commNotif.desc: Community notification will be delivered to your primary address:
commNotif.discussion.empty: You have no override email addresses for discussion emails.
commNotif.discussion.popoverBody: Offers discussion posts from a single community. Can be delivered to you by email in real-time or aggregated in a single daily email. Configure the frequency and delivery details of discussion notifications for each community below.
commNotif.discussion.title: Discussion Email:
commNotif.heading: Community Notifications
commNotif.overrideDesc: To receive specific community notifications at an address other than your primary, set override(s) where desired.
commNotif.weekly.popoverBody: Offers a comprehensive view of all activity from the preceding week for the communities you specify in a single email. This includes announcements, blogs, discussions, library entries, new members and volunteer opportunities.
commNotif.weekly.title: Weekly Consolidated Community Digest:
notif.autoSetNoEmail: Automatically set community discussion emails to "No Email" when a community is added to a consolidated digest.
notif.weekly.btn.title: Weekly Consolidated Digest
topicNotif.heading: Topic Notifications
topicNotif.popoverBody:
No Email – You will not receive any email notifications from the topic community.

Personalized Digest – A daily email summarizing all content relevant to your preferences, interests, and activity.

Personalized Digest & Real-Time Discussion Emails – Personalized digest and real-time emails for discussion threads related to your Stated Interests.
